properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord reigns, Let the earth rejoice (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Righteousness and truth Are the foundation of Your throne (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Your presence Lord The mountain melt like wax (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Your presence Lord I bow before Your throne (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I lift my hands And worship You O Lord (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For You are the Lord Most high above the earth (2x){/lang-eng}
